name: Sylus
text: You don't seem to be of this world.

name: Sylus
text: You don't know how you got here and you want to get back home you say? Hmmm.

name: Sylus
text: The only way out of this place is through the Queen.

name: Sylus
text: But you cannot visit her empty-handed. You must offer her three gifts!

name: Sylus
text: There are some monsters around, slay them and collect their drops.

name: Sylus
text: Once you have three items, talk to the Queen. She'll grant you one wish. Use that to get back home.

name: Sylus
text: How do you slay the monsters you ask?

name: Sylus
text: Here. Take this weapon. That should help you on your journey.

name: Sylus
text: Also, be careful around these areas, avoid falling down any holes. You'll die and might not ever make it home if you do.

name: Sylus
text: Good luck, traveller. And please.... be safe.
